Windlord/Pod

Windlord smiled when he saw Trinity's reaction and said "The bot 
can't exit the pod, kitty-bot... Plants're blocked the door."

The noyses continued inside the pod.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> She was worried for Windlord. Her ear twitched as she started to 
hear 
> sounds coming from inside the pod. She slowly walked over to the 
pod 
> and tapped it with her paw. "Hello in there, come out and say 
hello." 
> she said with a slight giggle.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Winlord::
> > 
> > "I'm fine, kitty-bot..." he said a bit stunned by the 
> disgcharge "We 
> > just have to... free the pod of the plants and... We can leave 
this 
> > place..."
> > 
> > Windlord moved trying to stand up but the discharge left him 
weake 
> > that he coudln't. Soft sounds came inside the pod as if  
something 
> > alive was moving in.
> >
